participant_1.background:
I own a cat and a dog.
I am a party animal.
I am deathly afraid of heights.
I help out at the food bank occasionally.

participant_2.background:
One of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish.
I am a musician.
My next language to study is french.
I also study languages.
My favorite spanish word is trabajo.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to play music, study languages, and volunteer at the food bank.
That's cool! I like to play music too, but I'm not very good at it.
No worries, everyone has to start somewhere. What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play pop music, but I also like to play classical music.
Cool! I'm more of a rock and roll person myself, but I like all kinds of music.
Me too! I love music from all over the world.
That's awesome! I'm currently studying Spanish and French.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn Spanish.
It's a lot of fun! I'm learning a lot about the culture and history of Spain.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be fluent in no time.
Thanks! I hope so. I love learning new languages.
Me too! It's a great way to expand your horizons.
I agree! It's also a great way to meet new people.
That's true! I've met a lot of great people through learning languages.
Me too! I'm glad I decided to start learning Spanish. It's been a lot of fun and I've learned a lot.
Me too! I'm glad I decided to start learning languages too. It's a great way to expand my horizons and meet new people.
